title: How to make TV look a billion dollars: meet the ‘wealth consultants’ behind Succession and Billions
text:
Most of us would never have to consider how to disembark a helicopter. But, as Kieran Culkin found while shooting the pilot for Succession, billionaires do it differently. “You wouldn't duck,” established Culkin, who plays playboy heir Roman Roy. “Because we grew up getting out of helicopters, you just walk right the f--- out.”

Culkin wasn’t the only one learning how to get out of a chopper as if it were a cab: television writers aren’t overly familiar with the lives of the super-wealthy either. So the creators of Succession (Brian Cox heading up a Murdoch-like clan) and Billions (hedge fund drama starring Damien Lewis) turned to people who knew how the other half live.
